dataList.dlg: As of this moment, anyone who frowns at me will be dishonorably discharged.
Oversleeping is not tolerated on my watch. Such tardiness in wartime is asking to be killed.
Look at those slackers, getting ready to roam about looking for a place to dine... I suggest we stock rations on the bus.
I haven't had the luxury of a proper sleep for a long time. I witnessed the devastation that awaited me after a moment of rest.
I never quite expected to meet the man here. Our wartime hero who had vanished as soon as the war was over...
A swarm of insects never know to give up. They rush out without a hint of reservation, and their jaws gnaw even the dead.
My old subordinates... They would charge ahead at a single gesture of my hand, advancing until nothing but empty husks remained in their wake. A stark contrast from what I have here.
I'm still not accustomed to the blue sky. As well as the fact that I can freely breathe this air. And the absence of shouts and cries that would break the dawn.
Receiving commands from someone who has zero experience in combat was unfathomable to me. However... I'm learning here that every rule has exceptions.
Perhaps a squad-wide roll call will knock some sense into them...
Salutations. I shall do my utmost to serve.
Ready to go!
I'm counting on your commands.
Do you need my advice?
Charging in.
I spotted a vulnerability.
Tch!
Where do I go next?
There will be a full-on roll call tonight.
An excellent command.
I can't expect every command to be flawless.
You're worse than pests.
I must acknowledge that your leadership rivals mine.
If only I assumed full command...
